name: Libro
0:
”Alexa open libro.”
”Alexa ask libro to search for a book by Dan Brown.”
”Alexa ask libro to search for a book dragons love tacos written by Adam”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: libro
Developer Terms of Use
des: ConverSight.ai’s LIBRO makes the library process easy for the patrons for all ages and every type of libraries including local, public, and academic. Patrons and students can check the availability of books, reserve and renew books, check things like the library’s hours or upcoming events, and manage their accounts through voice from their Alexa and mobile device. The application also aids the visually impaired patrons as well as to the ones who cannot read English. For more details on the solution, visit http://www.conversight.ai/libro/ or contact us on librosupport@conversight.ai
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
